attributes.action: Demand an independant audit of the EU budget  before paying 39 billion.
attributes.additional_details: During any break-up(divorce) or buisness partnership separation, an independent audit of the books would always be carried out.In addition also and independant asset appraisal, these are key issues in assessing our withdrawal bill.In no circumstance would only one party dictate asset values to the other without this Audit/ Asset appraisals being carried out by an independent party.
attributes.background: The European Union has or is providing a formula for assessing the United Kingdoms bill, in order to provide satisfactory clarity as to  these costs for the UK tax payer, we must be able to assess the accuracy of the cost.The EU has not been able to pass a budget for several years.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what action you'd like the Government to take. The European Court of Auditors audits the revenue and expenditure of the EU budget every year.

You can find out more about the auditing activities of the ECA in 2016 here:

http://www.eca.europa.eu/en/Pages/DocItem.aspx?did=41192
